property.name: driver
property.value: ${master.jdbc.driver}

property.name: driverUrl
property.value: ${master.jdbc.url}

property.name: user
property.value: ${master.jdbc.username}

property.name: password
property.value: ${master.jdbc.password}

property.name: maximumConnectionCount
property.value: ${master.jdbc.maxActive}

property.name: minimumConnectionCount
property.value: ${master.jdbc.maxIdle}

property.name: trace
property.value: true

property.name: verbose
property.value: true

property.name: jdbcUrl
property.value: ${master.jdbc.url}

property.name: testSql
property.value: select * from dual

property.name: sqlLoadRtu
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.SIMKH AS SIM_NUM, SUBSTR(p0.CSDQZ, 1, 2) AS COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(p0.CSDQZ, 4) AS COMM_ADDRESS, SUBSTR(p1.CSDQZ, 1, 2) AS B1_COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(p1.CSDQZ, 4) AS B1_COMM_ADDRESS FROM ZC_ZDZC a LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_ZDCS p0 ON a.ZDJH = p0.ZDJH AND p0.CSX = '8010' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_ZDCS p1 ON a.ZDJH = p1.ZDJH AND p1.CSX = '8011'

property.name: sqlLoadGwRtu
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.SIMKH AS SIM_NUM, SUBSTR(a.ZDZTXDZ, 1, 2) AS COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(a.ZDZTXDZ, 4) AS COMM_ADDRESS, SUBSTR(a.ZDTXDZB1, 1, 2) AS B1_COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(a.ZDTXDZB1, 4) AS B1_COMM_ADDRESS FROM ZC_JCZC a

property.name: sqlLoadRtu
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_ZDZC a

property.name: sqlLoadGwRtu
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_JCZC a

property.name: sqlLoadMeasurePoints
property.value: SELECT m.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, m.CLDH AS TN, m.CLDLX AS STATION_TYPE, m.CLDJH AS STATION_NO, m.CT AS CT, m.PT AS PT, a.hh AS CUSTOMER_NO, a.sjid AS DATE_SAVE_ID, p1.CSDQZ AS ATR_ADDRESS, p2.CSDQZ AS ATR_PROTOCOL, p3.CSDQZ AS ATR_PORT FROM SB_RWSJZB a,ZC_ZDZC Z, ZD_CLD m LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p1 ON m.CLDID = p1.CLDID AND p1.CSX = '8902' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p2 ON m.CLDID = p2.CLDID AND p2.CSX = '8903' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p3 ON m.CLDID = p3.CLDID AND p3.CSX = '8904' WHERE a.zdjh=m.zdjh AND a.dwdm=m.dwdm AND a.cldjh=m.cldjh AND a.zdjh=z.zdjh AND a.hh=z.hh AND m.SFYX = '1' AND a.SFYX='1'

property.name: sqlLoadGwMeasurePoints
property.value: SELECT m.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, m.CLDH AS TN, m.CLDLX AS STATION_TYPE, m.CLDJH AS STATION_NO, m.CT AS CT, m.PT AS PT, a.hh AS CUSTOMER_NO, a.sjid AS DATE_SAVE_ID FROM SB_RWSJZB a,ZC_JCZC Z, ZD_JCCLD m WHERE a.zdjh=m.zdjh AND a.dwdm=m.dwdm AND a.cldjh=m.cldjh AND a.zdjh=z.zdjh AND a.hh=z.hh AND m.SFYX = '1' AND a.SFYX='1'

property.name: sqlLoadAlertCode
property.value: SELECT GJBM AS CODE FROM JB_GJBM

property.name: sqlLoadAlertCodeArgs
property.value: SELECT GJBM,MRSJX,XH FROM JB_GJBMMRCS ORDER BY XH

property.name: sqlLoadRtuTask
property.value: SELECT ZDJH AS RTU_ID, MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWSX AS TASK_TEMPLATE_PROPERTY, RWH AS RTU_TASK_NUM, CLDH AS TN FROM RW_ZDRW WHERE SFYX = '1'

property.name: sqlLoadGwRtuTask
property.value: SELECT ZDJH AS RTU_ID, MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWSX AS TASK_TEMPLATE_PROPERTY, RWH AS RTU_TASK_NUM, CLDH AS TN FROM RW_JCRW WHERE SFYX = '1'

property.name: sqlLoadTaskDbConfig
property.value: select sjbh,path from table(pkg_fep_service.getSjxMap)

property.name: sqlLoadTaskTemplate
property.value: SELECT MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWLX AS TASK_TYPE, CYKSJZSJDW AS SAMPLE_START_TIME_UNIT, CYKSJZSJZ AS SAMPLE_START_TIME, CYJGSJDW AS SAMPLE_INTERVAL_UNIT, CYJGSJ AS SAMPLE_INTERVAL, SBJGSJDW AS UPLOAD_INTERVAL_UNIT, SBJGSJ AS UPLOAD_INTERVAL, SBJZSJDW AS UPLOAD_START_TIME_UNIT, SBJZSJ AS UPLOAD_START_TIME, SBSJPL AS FREQUENCE FROM MB_ZDRW

property.name: sqlLoadTaskTemplateItem
property.value: SELECT MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, SJX AS CODE FROM MB_CLSJX ORDER BY XH

property.name: sqlLoadSysConfig
property.value: SELECT PZZ FROM XT_PZ WHERE XMBM = 'ZDYCGK' AND (PZBM = 'BJ10' OR PZBM = 'BJ11')order by PZBM

property.name: sqlGetRtuByRtuId
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_ZDZC a WHERE a.ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetRtuByRtua
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_ZDZC a WHERE a.ZDLJDZ = ?

property.name: sqlGetGwRtuByRtuId
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_JCZC a WHERE a.ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetGwRtuByRtua
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.GQXMM AS HI_AUTH_PASSWORD, a.DQXMM AS LO_AUTH_PASSWORD FROM ZC_JCZC a WHERE a.ZDLJDZ = ?

property.name: sqlGetComRtuByRtua
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.SIMKH AS SIM_NUM, SUBSTR(p0.CSDQZ, 1, 2) AS COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(p0.CSDQZ, 4) AS COMM_ADDRESS, SUBSTR(p1.CSDQZ, 1, 2) AS B1_COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(p1.CSDQZ, 4) AS B1_COMM_ADDRESS FROM ZC_ZDZC a LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_ZDCS p0 ON a.ZDJH = p0.ZDJH AND p0.CSX = '8010' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_ZDCS p1 ON a.ZDJH = p1.ZDJH AND p1.CSX = '8011' WHERE a.ZDLJDZ = ?

property.name: sqlGetComGwRtuByRtua
property.value: SELECT a.ZDJH AS ID, a.DWDM AS DEPT_CODE, a.ZDGYLX AS RTU_PROTOCOL, a.ZDLJDZ AS LOGIC_ADDRESS, a.ZZCJBM AS MANUFACTURER, a.SIMKH AS SIM_NUM, SUBSTR(a.ZDZTXDZ, 1, 2) AS COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(a.ZDZTXDZ, 4) AS COMM_ADDRESS, SUBSTR(a.ZDTXDZB1, 1, 2) AS B1_COMM_TYPE, SUBSTR(a.ZDTXDZB1, 4) AS B1_COMM_ADDRESS FROM ZC_JCZC a WHERE a.ZDLJDZ = ?

property.name: sqlGetMeasurePoints
property.value: SELECT m.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, m.CLDH AS TN, m.CLDLX AS STATION_TYPE, m.CLDJH AS STATION_NO, m.CT AS CT, m.PT AS PT, a.hh AS CUSTOMER_NO, a.sjid AS DATE_SAVE_ID, p1.CSDQZ AS ATR_ADDRESS, p2.CSDQZ AS ATR_PROTOCOL, p3.CSDQZ AS ATR_PORT FROM SB_RWSJZB a, ZD_CLD m LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p1 ON m.CLDID = p1.CLDID AND p1.CSX = '8902' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p2 ON m.CLDID = p2.CLDID AND p2.CSX = '8903' LEFT OUTER JOIN ZD_CLDCS p3 ON m.CLDID = p3.CLDID AND p3.CSX = '8904' WHERE a.zdjh=m.zdjh AND a.dwdm=m.dwdm AND a.cldjh=m.cldjh AND m.SFYX = '1' AND a.SFYX='1' AND a.ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetGwMeasurePoints
property.value: SELECT m.ZDJH AS RTU_ID, m.CLDH AS TN, m.CLDLX AS STATION_TYPE, m.CLDJH AS STATION_NO, m.CT AS CT, m.PT AS PT, a.hh AS CUSTOMER_NO, a.sjid AS DATE_SAVE_ID FROM SB_RWSJZB a, ZD_JCCLD m WHERE a.zdjh=m.zdjh AND a.dwdm=m.dwdm AND a.cldjh=m.cldjh AND m.SFYX = '1' AND a.SFYX='1' AND a.ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetRtuTask
property.value: SELECT ZDJH AS RTU_ID, MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWSX AS TASK_TEMPLATE_PROPERTY, RWH AS RTU_TASK_NUM, CLDH AS TN FROM RW_ZDRW WHERE SFYX = '1' AND ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetGwRtuTask
property.value: SELECT ZDJH AS RTU_ID, MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWSX AS TASK_TEMPLATE_PROPERTY, RWH AS RTU_TASK_NUM, CLDH AS TN FROM RW_JCRW WHERE SFYX = '1' AND ZDJH = ?

property.name: sqlGetTaskTemplate
property.value: SELECT MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, RWLX AS TASK_TYPE, CYKSJZSJDW AS SAMPLE_START_TIME_UNIT, CYKSJZSJZ AS SAMPLE_START_TIME, CYJGSJDW AS SAMPLE_INTERVAL_UNIT, CYJGSJ AS SAMPLE_INTERVAL, SBJGSJDW AS UPLOAD_INTERVAL_UNIT, SBJGSJ AS UPLOAD_INTERVAL, SBJZSJDW AS UPLOAD_START_TIME_UNIT, SBJZSJ AS UPLOAD_START_TIME, SBSJPL AS FREQUENCE FROM MB_ZDRW WHERE MBID = ?

property.name: sqlGetTaskTemplateItem
property.value: SELECT MBID AS TASK_TEMPLATE_ID, SJX AS CODE FROM MB_CLSJX WHERE MBID= ? ORDER BY XH

property.name: insertCommandResult
property.value: INSERT INTO ZZCZ_MLJG( MLJGID, MLID, CLDH, GJBM, SJX, SJZ, SJSJ, BCSJ, TD ) VALUES( S_ZZCZ_MLJG.NEXTVAL, :commandId, :tn, :alertCode, :code, :value, :time ,:programTime , :channel )

property.name: insertGwCommandResult
property.value: INSERT INTO ZZCZ_JCZCJG(MLID, CLDH, GJBM, SJX, SJZ, SJSJ) VALUES( :commandId, :tn, :alertCode, :code,:value, :time )

property.name: insertRtuComdMag
property.value: MERGE INTO zd_mlczgl a USING (SELECT :logicAddress as zdljdz,:zxh as zxh,:cmdId as mlid,:bwsl as bwsl,:zdzjbz as zdzjbz FROM dual) b ON (a.zdljdz = b.zdljdz AND a.zxh = b.zxh) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mlid = b.mlid,bwsl = b.bwsl,czsj=sysdate,zdzjbz=b.zdzjbz WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (zdljdz,zxh,mlid,bwsl,zdzjbz) VALUES (b.zdljdz,b.zxh,b.mlid,b.bwsl,b.zdzjbz)

property.name: sqlGetGwRtuSetValue
property.value: SELECT MLID,CLDH,SJXZT FROM ZZCZ_JCSZJG WHERE MLID=?

property.name: updateGwRtuSetValue
property.value: UPDATE ZZCZ_JCSZJG SET SJXZT=? WHERE MLID=?

property.name: sqlGetRtuComdItem
property.value: SELECT MLID,BWSL,ZDZJBZ FROM ZD_MLCZGL WHERE ZDLJDZ=? AND ZXH=?

property.name: sqlGetRtuSycItem
property.value: SELECT ZDJH,TBLB,TBSJ FROM ZD_CSTB WHERE TBSJ>? ORDER BY TBSJ

property.name: callString
property.value: {?INTEGER = call pkg_fep_service.get_zdzxh(#p_zdljdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#p_zdywlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#p_zdgylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#)}

property.name: callString
property.value: {call comm_service.update_command_status(#id,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#,#rtuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#status,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#errcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#messageCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#)}

property.name: callString
property.value: {call comm_service.update_param_result_value(#rtuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#rtuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#rtuProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#tn,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#code,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#status,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#,#sbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#)}

property.name: callString
property.value: {call pkg_fep_service.sbsjmxb_ins(#deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#rtuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#code,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#value,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,mode=IN#,#txfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#ct,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#,#pt,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#)}

property.name: callString
property.value: {call pkg_fep_service.sb_gj_ins(#dataSaveID,jdbcType=NUMERIC,mode=IN#,#deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#rtuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#alertCodeHex,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#alertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,mode=IN#,#sbcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#,#txfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN#)}

property.name: sql
property.value: MERGE INTO tj_zdlljs a USING (SELECT :logicAddress AS zdljdz, TO_DATE(:dateString,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rq, :downGprsFlowmeter AS xxgprs, :downSmsCount AS xxsms, :upGprsFlowmeter AS sxgprs, :upSmsCount AS sxsms, :rtuIpAddr AS gprsip, :upMobile AS simkh, :lastGprsRecvTime AS gprssxsj, :lastSmsRecvTime AS smssxsj, :hasTask AS sfyrw, :upGprsCount AS sxgprsbws, :downGprsCount AS xxgprsbws, null AS sxyxjbh, null AS xxyxjbh, :activeGprs AS zdztxdz, :activeUms AS dxyyh FROM dual) b ON (a.zdljdz = b.zdljdz AND a.rq = b.rq) WHEN MATCHED then UPDATE SET xxgprs = b.xxgprs, xxsms = b.xxsms, sxgprs = b.sxgprs, sxsms = b.sxsms, gprsip = b.gprsip, simkh = b.simkh, gprssxsj = b.gprssxsj, smssxsj = b.smssxsj, sfyrw = b.sfyrw, sxgprsbws = b.sxgprsbws, xxgprsbws = b.xxgprsbws, sxyxjbh = b.sxyxjbh, xxyxjbh = b.xxyxjbh, zdztxdz = b.zdztxdz, dxyyh = b.dxyyh WHEN NOT MATCHED then INSERT (zdljdz, rq, xxgprs, xxsms, sxgprs, sxsms, gprsip, simkh, gprssxsj, smssxsj, sfyrw, sxgprsbws, xxgprsbws, sxyxjbh, xxyxjbh, zdztxdz, dxyyh) VALUES (b.zdljdz, b.rq, b.xxgprs, b.xxsms, b.sxgprs, b.sxsms, b.gprsip, b.simkh, b.gprssxsj, b.smssxsj, b.sfyrw, b.sxgprsbws, b.xxgprsbws, b.sxyxjbh, b.xxyxjbh, b.zdztxdz, b.dxyyh)
